title: Access an Electrical Schematic
description: A technician is troubleshooting a control panel and needs the electrical schematic for the machine.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the equipment they are working on.

tasks.description: Search the technical document library for schematic diagrams related to that model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a list of documents, including the electrical schematic.

tasks.description: Open the schematic and zoom in on the specific circuit for the control panel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully views the detailed wiring diagram needed for the repair.
